title: Life's Unexpected Gifts
description: With the recent loss of her father, Emma Dawson struggled to get through each day. When she starts receiving gifts from a secret admirer, sheâ€™s forced to reevaluate everything she thought she knew. Will she be able to open her heart to the mystery man of her dreams, or will a blast from the past sweep her off her feet? Could they be one in the same?
author: Lisa Bilbrey
